title: anyone else thing a gentleman kennen would look awsome?
body: I also think order of the lotus kennen or warring kingdoms kennen would look cool but I cant image them as much

replies.body:
I think a new Kennen skin in general would be really good. Honestly, I sure hope he gets a new skin soon...been like four years since his last one and it would be nice to get a new Kennen model in general.

Blood Moon Kennen is another possibility or even a Scientist Kennen could be cool too considering how Shen and Akali got skins for the former, but not Kennen oddly.
on of my buddy's said blood moon kennen and I do agree that would be pretty awesome like a blood red kimono and maybe like a kinda white  hood whith red detailing on it
I strongly favour blood moon kennen, with extra bits of bling on his effects, red and white arcs everywhere and an explosion of fireworks when you kill someone.
Imagine a shower of fireworks as Kennen's ult instead of thunderbolts! It would be so fitting and brilliant for a new skin for the little Yordle ninja!

Unfortunately, it seems the Gentleman skins are reserved for the more ironic champs (Cho'Gath and Gnar, the only two gentleman skin owners, are perfect examples of the irony). Sorry about that. Still, fingers crossed for Gentleman Volibear (not really)!

That is very true about the former gentleman skins; however, a Debonair skin for Kennen could still be possible. He could probably toss pocket knives instead of shurikens. xD

http://img07.deviantart.net/13b7/i/2015/077/2/7/debonair_kennen_by_lol_ideias-d8m9ba1.png

(credits to LOL-Ideias )

Blood Moon is still the skin I'd love to see the most for the little ninja; however, he could look snazzy in a top hat too!

Even something as amazing as this incredible fanart of Bloon Moon Kennen shows the possibilities of how great he'd look in the Blood Moon style!  

http://img04.deviantart.net/a262/i/2013/286/d/d/blood_moon_kennen_by_akiman-d6qcw0j.jpg

However, I wouldn't say no to a Gentleman Kennen either. Gentleman Gnar has become one of my favourite personal skins! :D
